globalResponses.cooldown: That command is currently on cooldown.
globalResponses.error: An error occurred while executing a command.
globalResponses.noPermission: You do not have permission to use that command.
globalResponses.notAuthorized: You do not have authorization to use that command.
globalResponses.serverOnly: That command can only be used in a server.

banResponses.noPermission: I do not have permission to ban that user.

helpResponses.error: It seems like you have DMs disabled.

kickResponses.noPermission: I do not have permission to kick that user.

musicResponses.error: An error occurred while trying to play a song.
musicResponses.invalidVoiceChannel: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot.
musicResponses.invalidVolume: Volume must be a number within 1-100.
musicResponses.noSong: There is no song currently playing.
musicResponses.noVoiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel.
musicResponses.triviaRunning: There is currently a trivia running.
musicResponses.voteRunning: There is already a skip vote running.

musictriviaResponses.isNotParticipating: You must be participating in the trivia.
musictriviaResponses.noVoiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel.
musictriviaResponses.triviaRunning: There is already a trivia running.

pollResponses.tooLittleOptions: You must provide at least 2 options.
pollResponses.tooManyOptions: You can only provide at most 10 options.
pollResponses.pollRunning: There is currently a poll running.
